meanings.definition: A large van or wagon used for transporting furniture.
meanings.sent1: The pantechnicon arrived to move the new sofa into the house.
meanings.sent2: The pantechnicon parked outside the building to deliver the furniture.
meanings.sent3: The pantechnicon driver joked that he could fit the whole house in his van.
meanings.sent4: The pantechnicon stood like a giant moving box on wheels.
meanings.sent5: The bright red pantechnicon stood out among the other vehicles with its size and purpose.

meanings.definition: A building or place where a variety of goods are stored.
meanings.sent1: The old warehouse was converted into a pantechnicon for storing surplus items.
meanings.sent2: The pantechnicon was filled with all sorts of treasures waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent3: The pantechnicon was so full of items that it seemed like a magical storage room.
meanings.sent4: The pantechnicon was a treasure trove of forgotten goods waiting to be explored.
meanings.sent5: The pantechnicon was like a hidden cave full of mysterious objects waiting to be found.
